name: Sirloin Steak with Garlic Butter
author: Bob Cody
summary: I have never tasted any other steak that came even close to the ones made with this recipe. If you are having steak, don't skimp on flavor to save a few calories. The butter makes this steak melt in your mouth wonderful.
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
In a small saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat with garlic powder and minced garlic
Sprinkle both sides of each steak with salt and pepper
Grill steaks 4 to 5 minutes per side, or to desired doneness
When done, transfer to warmed plates
Brush tops liberally with garlic butter, and allow to rest for 2 to 3 minutes before serving
